players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie was investigated & is the mafioso. Be cautious, he knows I'm the detective."
You: "Thanks Diana, I'm keeping an eye on Charlie. Stay vigilant."
Charlie: "I'm小心，我在夜里杀了一个人。Diana是侦探，请留意我。"
Diana: "Charlie confessed to killing Alice. Watch him closely, detectives have an advantage now."
You: "I'll watch Charlie and Diana closely. Stay alert."
Charlie: "I'm keeping an eye on Bob. Stay cautious."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested
